title: Kadir would have been alive if Mahinda had been President in August 2005 – Mrs. Kadirgamar
content: President Rajapaksa with Mrs Sugandhi Kadirgamar on Saturday at her Bullers Lane residence. President Mahinda Rajapaksa, who attended a religious ceremony in memory of the late Laksham Kadirgamar on Saturday was visibly moved when he was told by Mrs. Sugandhi Kadirgamar that her husband would still have been alive if Rajapaksa had been the President…
